name: Quantum Caverns
description:
Explore a mysterious cavern while you shift through dimensions on your to victory. Keep a look out for any pesky quantum crabs!

Quantum Caverns was designed to run natively on the ClockworkPi GameShell, but you can run the game on any computer that has the latest version of Python and Pygame installed. For easy installation and the latest updates, make sure to check out the game's Github page.
